halloween.title: Halloween Event 2025
halloween.subtitle: Join us for a spooktacular adventure this Halloween!
halloween.battle_pass.title: Battle Pass
halloween.battle_pass.description1: (Technically just an event but everyone is used to the term "battlepass").
halloween.battle_pass.description2: This event comes with a freshly developed and reimagined BattlePass system. We are super excited for you to try this new feature and give us your feedback and how we could improve for the next event!
halloween.stars.title: Stars
halloween.stars.description: Stars or Pass Stars are the BattlePass' currency used to buy items from the Shop. You can earn free stars by completing missions and quests, there are more than 100 obtainable stars. They can also be bought with Vote Points or Gems
halloween.shop.title: Shop
halloween.shop.description: Spend your Stars at the Shop, there you can buy the Halloween Crate or directly buy some exclusive items.
halloween.missions.title: Complete weekly missions
halloween.missions.description: Every week, you get to unlock and complete 6 different missions for Stars. Completing all missions grants you extra rewards.
halloween.quest.title: Quests
halloween.quest.description: Complete questlines during the event for Stars and Candy sacks.
halloween.workshop.title: Workshop
halloween.workshop.description: The BattlePass has it's own workshop where you can craft unique items such as the Candy Pet or the Candy Pumpkin armor set. You can also craft the Halloween Crate with your candies.
halloween.quests.title: Halloween Quest's
halloween.quests.llowee.title: Llowee Quest
halloween.quests.webina.title: Webina Quest
halloween.quests.mcbones.title: Bony McBones Quest
halloween.quests.mcbones.bring: Bring Vacuum to Talk to Bony McBones
halloween.treasure.title: Halloween Treasure
halloween.treasure.description1: Like every events on Minebox, this treasure is obtainable for FREE by crafting it with candies or by exchanging Vote Points for Pass Stars
halloween.treasure.description2: Exclusive Ghostbuster armor set, Exclusive Spooky Pumpkin armor set, Spooky Pumpkin Staff, Legendary pet: Bummy, Mythic flyable mount: Turbo Broom, Halloween-themed furniture & decorations for your island!
halloween.new_mobs.title: New Mobs
